GenAiFunction.description: This action will be making use of the Update application Prompt that is Analyzing the Candidate__c and Matching them to the Job_Spec__c that they applied for. The Prompt will be intelligently answering questions on the Application__c object that sits in between the Applicant and Job Spec objects, specifically the Application Rating, Overview of applicant, What makes applicant a good fit and What requirements/ Skills missing fields Then you are to take these answers and populate the above fields on the Application object
